public interface

CacheProvider

humanize.spi.cache.CacheProvider
Known Indirect Subclasses
GuavaCacheProvider
GuavaCacheProvider CacheProvider implementation that uses Guava caches as in memory storage. 

Class Overview

Facade to access resource caches. Includes string arrays, bundles and formats by locale.

Summary
